AboutSection.desc: I'm studying my undergraduate degree in Statistics at the NorthEast Agricultral University, I found a strong interest in coding. The journey started with basic courses in computer science, datasets and HTML5CSS3, which naturally led me to front-end development. Going along with Angela Yu's lesson-- Frontend Development and finishing some projects confirmed that this is the career path I'd love to pursue. I've deepened my understanding and passion for front-end technologies. Eager to continue learning and applying innovative front-end solutions.I thrive on programming challenges and enjoy working with teams to solve complex problems. I specialize in technologies such as jQuery, Bootstrap and Vue, and have a solid understanding of JavaScript and HTML5/CSS3.In my spare time, I enjoying learning new skills and working on interesting projects 🛠️. I also have my own Github accounts to share interesting projects and learning resources. If I'm not at the computer, I enjoy listenning to Podcasts, watching movies and reading books🎶👂🏸.Hobbies,regular sleep and diet are my secrets to my energy.
